TopicTitle: Unable to run experiments (no option from parts action menus.)

Articles.Content:
I have a fairly heavily modded install of the current version of KSP 64 bit on mac, and I just started having the problem at launch/flight/EVA where I right click on a science part and there is no option to run the experiment. There may very well be other kinds of parts with different tweakables from right click that arent showing up either, but since this is pretty game breaking, I figured I should focus on this first.

ksp.log:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/mp5v3xleiq07buq/KSP.log?dl=0

player.log

https://www.dropbox.com/s/drondx3m3ko7lrw/Player.log?dl=0

Seems pretty likely to be a problem from a mod.  Have you done any investigation to figure out which mod it is?

The quick way:  Run with only half the mods installed, then the other half-- that'll tell you which half the culprit is in.  Then, take those mods, split in half, etc. until you've narrowed it down to just one mod.  Then you can post in that mod's thread with your tech issue.
